title: Bloomify
description: A web application created using React as part of a group project. It allows users to explore new plants & flowers and save plants they own, or want to own, to their 'sanctuary'. The application also provides a way to keep track of plant watering schedules.

title: Fare Divide Community Fridge
description: This was a volunteer project in which I built the website for Fare Divide Community Interest Company, using WordPress. The website has pages for numerous Community Fridges and other community endeavours.

title: The Financial Traveller
description: Application to give user the latest financial news and exchange rates for locations that they search. Uses APIs, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Application that uses the OpenWeatherAPI and jQuery to show the weather in any location the user searches for.

title: Work Day Calendar
description: Application that allows the user to submit calendar entries, making use of local storage and day.js.

title: Quiz Application
description: Interactive quiz application demonstrating JavaScript skills.

title: CSS-Only Portfolio
description: Portfolio site created using solely HTML & CSS.
